text: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice is a 2024 American dark fantasy comedy horror movie directed by Tim Burton. It is a sequel to Beetlejuice (1988). It stars Michael Keaton, Winona Ryder, Catherine O'Hara, Justin Theroux, Monica Bellucci, Jenna Ortega, and Willem Dafoe. Beetlejuice Beetlejuice opened the 81st Venice International Film Festival on August 28, 2024. It was released in theaters by Warner Bros. Pictures on September 6, 2024 to positive reviews. ==References== Category:2020s fantasy movies Category:2020s horror movies Category:2024 comedy movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Movies directed by Tim Burton Category:Movies composed by Danny Elfman Category:American fantasy movies Category:American horror movies Category:American comedy movies
title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
